flawed_nl_solution:
Bella eats during the week, 6 apples/day * 7 days/week = <<6*7=42>>42 apples/week
Grace harvests 42 apples/week * 3 = <<42*3=162>>162 apples during the week.
Leftover after Bella eats, 162 apples/week - 42 apples/week = <<162-42=120>>120 apples/week.
After 6 weeks Grace will have 120 apples/week * 6 weeks = <<120*6=720>>720 apples.
#### 720

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 126, not 162. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
